notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.J. and R.G. conceptualized and designed the experiments; J.B. performed sampling, distillations and antioxidant activities; A.J. and J.B. performed GC (FID) and GC/MS; A.J. performed toxicity test; J.S. and R.G. investigated antifungal activity; A.J., R.G. and J.B. prepared original draft; A.J. and R.G. revised the manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
